scripts.gcp:api:build: gcloud builds submit --config configs/cloudbuild.api.yaml --substitutions=COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest')
scripts.gcp:api:deploy: gcloud run deploy api --image gcr.io/graffiticode/api:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest') --port 3100 --region us-central1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars=AUTH_URL=https://auth.graffiticode.org
scripts.gcp:api:logs: gcloud run logs read api --region us-central1
scripts.gcp:auth:build: gcloud builds submit --config configs/cloudbuild.auth.yaml --substitutions=COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest')
scripts.gcp:auth:deploy: gcloud run deploy auth --image gcr.io/graffiticode/auth:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest') --port 4100 --region us-central1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.gcp:auth:logs: gcloud run logs read auth --region us-central1
